schema.value: [   {     key: "name",     label: "Name",     maxChars: 20,     required: true,     type: "multi-line",     validateWith: "min-max"   },   { key: "pic--", label: "Pic", required: true, type: "image" },   { key: "pic--mobile", label: "Pic Mobile", required: true, type: "image" },   {     key: "color",     label: "Color",     maxChars: 6,     minChars: 6,     required: true,     type: "multi-line",     validateWith: "min-max"   },   {     key: "txtColor",     label: "Text Color",     type: "switch",     options: [       { view: "Light", value: "light" },       { view: "Dark", value: "dark" }     ]   },   {     key: "title",     label: "Title",     maxChars: 200,     required: true,     type: "multi-line",     validateWith: "min-max"   },   {     key: "description",     label: "Description",     required: true,     type: "rich",     validateWith: "min-max"   },   {     key: "website",     label: "Website Address",     required: false,     type: "link",     validateWith: "link"   },   {     key: "video",     label: "Video",     required: false,     type: "link",     validateWith: "link"   },   {     key: "videoCaption",     label: "Video Caption",     required: false,     type: "multi-line",     validateWith: "min-max"   } ]
